FuncDef: The display isis statistics purge-lsp command displays statistics about purge LSPs on the network. The display isis statistics purge-lsp command displays statistics about purge LSPs on the network.
CLIs: display isis statistics purge-lsp [ <process-id> | { vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } ] [ level-1 | level-2 ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IS-IS process. If process-id is not specified in the command, statistics about purge LSPs of all IS-IS processes are displayed.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays statistics of IS-IS purge LSPs about specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

Displays statistics about IS-IS Level-1 purge LSPs.
-

Displays statistics about IS-IS Level-2 purge LSPs.
-
